snippet: Raphael Minder, the IHT's Madrid correspondent, on what the suspension of Judge Baltasar Garzón says and doesn't say about Spanish justice.
abstract: Raphael Minder, the IHT's Madrid correspondent, on what the suspension of Judge Baltasar Garzón says and doesn't say about Spanish justice.
lead_paragraph: MADRID - In May 2010, a month after his indictment, Judge Baltasar Garzón told me that, whatever the final verdict, his crusade for greater international justice would not be undone.

headline.main: Judge Garzón's Words to Our Correspondent
